LanguageData.RimTalk_ToyBlockPile.label: 积木堆
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToyBlockPile.description: 一小堆柔软的积木，适合幼小的手。
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToyRockingHorse.label: 摇摇马
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToyRockingHorse.description: 一个小摇摇马，可以安抚婴儿并训练平衡。
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToyPuzzleTable.label: 拼图桌
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToyPuzzleTable.description: 一张摆放简单拼图和玩具的小桌子。
